功能描述:
Get module manufacturer information, including manufacturer, model, and version.
Command Format
参数:
- `<manufacturer>`: Module manufacturer information, product name, version number

- `<module_version>`: Module model

- `<soft_version>`: Module software version

功能描述:
Query software version information.
Command Format
参数: - `<reversion>`: Module software version information

功能描述:
Query received signal strength <rssi>.
Command Format
参数:
- `<signal>`: The following is the correspondence between signal (CSQ) and rssi:
  - `0`: <4 or 99 | <-107 dBm or unknown
  - `1`: <10 | <-93dBm
  - `2`: <16 | <-81 dBm
  - `3`: <22 | <-69dBm
  - `4`: <28 | <-57dBm
  - `5`: >=28 | >=-57 dBm

- `<ber>`: —
  - `99`: Bit error rate cannot be measured

功能描述:
Query the current network registration status of the module.
Command Format
参数:
- `<n>`: 0: Disable active result code provision for network registration (default setting)
1: Allow active result code provision for network registration
2: Allow active location information provision (CELL ID, LOCAL ID).
  - `0`: Disable active result code provision for network registration (default setting)
  - `1`: Allow active result code provision for network registration
  - `2`: Allow active location information provision (CELL ID, LOCAL ID).

- `<stat>`: 0: Not registered, the terminal is not currently searching for a new operator
1: Registered to the local network
2: Not registered, the terminal is searching for a base station
3: Registration denied
4: Unknown code
5: Registered, in roaming state
6: ltesms only home
7: ltesms only roaming
8: EMER SVCE ONLY
9: CSFB NOT PREFER HOME
10: CSFB NOT PREFER ROAMING
  - `0`: Not registered
  - `1`: Registered to the local network
  - `2`: Not registered
  - `3`: Registration denied
  - `4`: Unknown code
  - `5`: Registered
  - `6`: ltesms only home
  - `7`: ltesms only roaming
  - `8`: EMER SVCE ONLY
  - `9`: CSFB NOT PREFER HOME
  - `10`: CSFB NOT PREFER ROAMING

- `<lac>`: String type, 2-byte hexadecimal location area code

- `<ci>`: String type, 2-byte hexadecimal cell ID

- `<Act>`: 0: GSM
1: GSM compact
2: UTRAN
3: GSM w/EGPRS
4: UTRAN w/HSDPA
5: UTRAN w/HSUPA
6: UTRAN w/HSDPA AND w/HSUPA
7: E-UTRAN
8: UTRAN w/HSPA+
  - `0`: GSM
  - `1`: GSM compact
  - `2`: UTRAN
  - `3`: GSM w/EGPRS
  - `4`: UTRAN w/HSDPA
  - `5`: UTRAN w/HSUPA
  - `6`: UTRAN w/HSDPA AND w/HSUPA
  - `7`: E-UTRAN
  - `8`: UTRAN w/HSPA+

功能描述:
Query EPS network registration status.
Command Format
参数:
- `<n>`: 0: Disable active result code provision for network registration (default setting)
1: Allow active result code provision for network registration
2: Allow active location information provision (CELL ID, LOCAL ID)
4: Allow active provision of Active-Time and Periodic-TAU
  - `0`: Disable active result code provision for network registration (default setting)
  - `1`: Allow active result code provision for network registration
  - `2`: Allow active location information provision (CELL ID, LOCAL ID)
  - `4`: Allow active provision of Active-Time and Periodic-TAU

- `<stat>`: 0: Not registered, the terminal is not currently searching for a new operator
1: Registered to the local network
2: Not registered, the terminal is searching for a base station
3: Registration denied
4: Unknown code
5: Registered, in roaming state
  - `0`: Not registered
  - `1`: Registered to the local network
  - `2`: Not registered
  - `3`: Registration denied
  - `4`: Unknown code
  - `5`: Registered

- `<tac>`: String type, 2-byte hexadecimal location area code

- `<ci>`: String type, 2-byte hexadecimal cell ID

- `<Act>`: 0: GSM
1: GSM compact
2: UTRAN
3: GSM w/EGPRS
4: UTRAN w/HSDPA
5: UTRAN w/HSUPA
6: UTRAN w/HSDPA and HSUPA
7: E-UTRAN
  - `0`: GSM
  - `1`: GSM compact
  - `2`: UTRAN
  - `3`: GSM w/EGPRS
  - `4`: UTRAN w/HSDPA
  - `5`: UTRAN w/HSUPA
  - `6`: UTRAN w/HSDPA and HSUPA
  - `7`: E-UTRAN

功能描述:
Query network.
Command Format
参数:
- `<mode>`: Used to set automatic network selection or manual network selection.
0: Automatic network selection (ignore parameter <oper>)
1: Manual network selection
2: Deregister from the network
3: Set <format> only
4: First manually select the network, then automatically select the network (if manual selection fails, it will enter automatic selection)
  - `0`: Automatic network selection (ignore parameter <oper>)
  - `1`: Manual network selection
  - `2`: Deregister from the network
  - `3`: Set <format> only
  - `4`: First manually select the network, then automatically select the network (if manual selection fails

- `<format>`: 0: Long alphanumeric <oper> (default setting)
1: Short format alphanumeric <oper>
2: Numeric <oper>
  - `0`: Long alphanumeric <oper> (default setting)
  - `1`: Short format alphanumeric <oper>
  - `2`: Numeric <oper>

- `<oper>`: Assigned in <format>, can be a long alphanumeric format of 16 characters, a short alphanumeric format of 8 characters, or a numeric format of 5 characters (MCC/MNC)

- `<AcT>`: Displays the radio access technology, with the following values:
0: GSM
1: GSM compact
3: GSM w/EGPRS
7: E-UTRAN
  - `Values are as follows`: 
  - `0`: GSM
  - `1`: GSM compact
  - `3`: GSM w/EGPRS
  - `7`: E-UTRAN

命令标题: Query International Mobile Subscriber Identity Code
功能描述:
Obtain the International Mobile Subscriber Identity (IMSI).
Command Syntax
参数:
- `<IMSI>`: International Mobile Subscriber Identity Code.
This code consists of 15 digits, starting with a 3-digit MCC and a 2-digit MNC, used for authenticating the SIM card.

功能描述:
Obtain the product serial number of the module, which is the IMEI number (International Mobile Equipment Identity).
Command Syntax
参数: - `<IMEI>`: Product serial number of the module.

功能描述:
Obtain the product serial number of the module, which is the IMEI number (International Mobile Equipment Identity).
Command Syntax
参数: - `<IMEI>`: Product serial number of the module, consisting of 15 digits.

功能描述:
Get the ICCID of the SIM card.
Command Format
参数:
- `<ICCID>`: Integrated circuit card identity, which is the identification code of the inserted card.
ICCID is 20 digits.
  - `Integrate`: circuit card identity

功能描述:
Query the module model.
Command Format
参数: - `<model>`: Module model

功能描述:
Query the module model.
Command Format
参数: - `<model>`: Module model.

功能描述:
Set the module baud rate, saved by default when powered off.
If the baud rate query returns 0, it indicates that the module baud rate is adaptive. The default is adaptive baud rate (Note: adaptive baud rate does not exceed 115200).
Command Format

Select the module's function by setting <fun>. <fun> only supports certain values.
This parameter is not saved when powered off.
Command Format
参数:
- `<fun>`: 0: Minimum function (turn off radio and SIM power)
1: Full function (default)
4: Turn off the module's RF transmission and reception circuits (flight mode)
9: Upgrade function (can upgrade version via upper computer tool)
  - `0`: Minimum function (turn off radio and SIM power)
  - `1`: Full function (default)
  - `4`: Turn off the module's RF transmission and reception circuits (flight mode)
  - `9`: Upgrade function (can upgrade version via upper computer tool)

- `<rst>`: 0: do not reset the MT before setting it to <fun> power level
1: reset the MT before setting it to <fun> power level
  - `0`: do not reset the MT before setting it to <fun> power level
  - `1`: reset the MT before setting it to <fun> power level

功能描述:
Enable the communication module's serial port multiplexing function.
Based on a physical communication serial port, virtualize two or even more serial ports through a standardized protocol, generally virtualizing three serial ports, one for external protocol stack dial-up internet access, and the other two for sending and receiving AT commands. It is recommended to use AT+CMUX=0 to enable the serial port multiplexing function.
Command Format
参数:
- `<mode>`: Integer type, mode under MUX open state, at least basic mode needs to be supported in this specification
0: Basic mode (default value)
1: Enhanced mode (currently not supported)
  - `0`: Basic mode (default value)
  - `1`: Enhanced mode (currently not supported)

- `<subset>`: Integer type, frame format subset
0: UIH frames used only (default value)
1: UI frames used only (currently not supported)
2: Currently not supported
  - `0`: UIH frames used only (default value)
  - `1`: UI frames used only (currently not supported)
  - `2`: Currently not supported

- `<port_speed>`: Integer type, serial port speed
1: 9600bit/s
2: 19200bit/s
3: 38400bit/s
4: 57600bit/s
5: 115200bit/s (default value)
6: 230400bit/s
7: Currently not supported
8: Currently not supported
  - `1`: 9600bit/s
  - `2`: 19200bit/s
  - `3`: 38400bit/s
  - `4`: 57600bit/s
  - `5`: 115200bit/s (default value)
  - `6`: 230400bit/s
  - `7`: Currently not supported
  - `8`: Currently not supported

- `<N1>`: Integer type, maximum frame length, 1~32768; currently only supports the setting range of 1~2048
Default value in basic mode is 31
Default value in enhanced mode is 64

- `<T1>`: Integer type, receive confirmation timer, 1~255, 1 represents 10ms, default value is 10 (100ms)

- `<N2>`: Integer type, maximum reconnection times, 0~100, default value is 3, currently only supports 0~5

- `<T2>`: Integer type, multiplex control channel response timer, 2~255, 2 represents 20ms, default value is 30 (300ms)

- `<T3>`: Integer type, wake-up response timer, 1~255, 1 represents 1s, default value is 10 (10s)
(Currently does not support this parameter, returns 0 value when reading the command)

- `<k>`: Integer type, window size, 1~7, default value is 2, used to support error recovery in enhanced mode.
(Currently does not support this parameter, returns 0 value when reading the command)

功能描述:
Set and query the module's real-time clock.
The set time takes effect immediately, is saved during power off, and the default clock is in the 0 timezone, using 1/4 timezone.
Command Format
参数:
- `<time>`: String, format is “yy/MM/dd,hh:mm:ss[TZ]”, indicating year, month, day, hour, minute, second
  - `Format is`: “yy/MM/dd
  - `hh`: mm:ss[TZ]”

- `TZ`: A 2-digit number representing the time difference between local time and GMT.
This information is optional and will only be displayed if supported by the network. It will not be displayed when local time is GMT.

功能描述:
Query the PIN status and input the PIN code.
To input the PIN code, the current SIM card must be locked (AT+CLCK="SC",1,"1234") and the module must be restarted to input the PIN code. After three incorrect PIN entries, a PUK code will be required to unlock.
Command Format
参数:
- `<pin>, <newpin>`: String type

- `<code>`: READY: No password required
NO SIM: Card not detected
SIM PIN: PIN code required
SIM PUK: PUK code required
SIM PIN2: PIN2 code required
SIM PUK2: PUK2 code required
  - `READY`: No password required
  - `NO SIM`: Card not detected
  - `SIM PIN`: PIN code required
  - `SIM PUK`: PUK code required
  - `SIM PIN2`: PIN2 code required
  - `SIM PUK2`: PUK2 code required

命令标题: PIN Enable and Query Function Command
功能描述:
Lock, unlock, and query MT and network devices. Set this parameter, and it will take effect after restarting the module.
Command Format
参数:
- `<fac>`: Must be enclosed in double quotes ""
"OI": Outgoing international calls
"SC": SIM card
"AO": Outgoing calls
"OX": All outgoing international calls except local
"FD": SIM card fixed dialing space
  - `"OI"`: Outgoing international calls
  - `"SC"`: SIM card
  - `"AO"`: Outgoing calls
  - `"OX"`: All outgoing international calls except local
  - `"FD"`: SIM card fixed dialing space

- `<mode>`: 0: Unlock
1: Lock
2: Query status
  - `0`: Unlock
  - `1`: Lock
  - `2`: Query status

- `<status>`: 0: not active
1: active
  - `0`: not active
  - `1`: active

- `<passwd>`: Password or operation code, string type, must be enclosed in double quotes ""

- `<classx>`: 1: Voice service type
2: Data service type
4: Fax service type
8: Short message
16: Synchronous data service
32: Asynchronous data service
64: Dedicated packet access
128: Dedicated data packet dismantler access
  - `1`: Voice service type
  - `2`: Data service type
  - `4`: Fax service type
  - `8`: Short message
  - `16`: Synchronous data service
  - `32`: Asynchronous data service
  - `64`: Dedicated packet access
  - `128`: Dedicated data packet dismantler access

功能描述:
Change the password for the module lock function.
To change the PIN code, the SIM card must be locked first (AT+CLCK="SC",1,"1234").
Command Format
参数:
- `<fac>`: must be enclosed in double quotes ""
"P2": SIM PIN2
"SC": SIM card
  - `"P2"`: SIM PIN2
  - `"SC"`: SIM card

- `<oldpwd>`: must be enclosed in double quotes "", old password or operation code, string type

- `<newpwd>`: must be enclosed in double quotes "", new password or operation code, string type

功能描述:
Set the PDP (Packet Data Protocol) format for GPRS. The maximum length allowed for APN is 50.
Command Format
参数:
- `<cid>`: (PDP Context Identifier) a numeric parameter that specifies a PDP context definition, this parameter is local to the TE-MT interface and is applied to other PDP context-related commands, allowed values can be queried using the query command (minimum value is 1).
  - `(PDP`: Context Identifier) a numeric parameter
  - `this parameter is local to the TE`: MT interface and is applied to other PDP context-related commands

- `<PDP_type>`: (Packet Data Protocol type) string parameter used to specify the type of packet data protocol
"IP" network protocol (Internet Protocol) (IETFSTD 5)
  - `(Packet`: Data Protocol type) string parameter
  - `"IP" network protocol (Internet`: Protocol) (IETFSTD 5)

- `<APN>`: (Access Point Name) in string form, is a logical name used to select GGSN or external packet data networks.
  - `(Access`: Point Name) in string form

- `<PDP_address>`: in string form, used to distinguish MT in the address space.
If this parameter is not provided, the value will be provided by TE during the PDP startup process.
If TE fails to provide it, a dynamic address will be requested, even if an address was allocated during the PDP startup process, it will still return empty when querying with this command.

- `<d_comp>`: numeric parameter used to control PDP data compression (only applicable to SNDCP)
0 - off (default value)
  - `0`: off (default value)

- `<h_comp>`: numeric parameter used to control PDP header compression 0 - off (default value)
  - `numeric parameter used to control PDP header compression 0`: off (default value)

- `<pd1>, … <pdN>`: 0 to N, string type, related to the meaning of <PDP_type>

功能描述:
PDP authentication.
This command should be placed after the AT+CGDCONT command. Currently, there is a growing demand for user identity authentication in various places within private networks, using the internal protocol stack, this command needs to be used, so please add this command in the code flow.
The default username and password for Unicom cards are "card" and "card".
<cid> corresponds to <cid> in +CGDCONT.
The maximum string length allowed for <name> and <pwd> is 50.
Command Format
参数:
- `<cid>`: (PDP Context Identifier) a numeric parameter that specifies a PDP context definition
<cid> corresponds to <cid> in +CGDCONT.
  - `(PDP`: Context Identifier) a numeric parameter

- `<auth>`: authentication type, default is 1
0: NONE
1: PAP
2: CHAP
When the authentication type is not NONE, <name> and <pwd> parameters must be included
  - `0`: NONE
  - `1`: PAP
  - `2`: CHAP

- `<name>`: username

- `<pwd>`: password

功能描述:
This command is used to query and set GPRS attach and detach. It does not persist after power off.
By default, the module actively performs GPRS attach.
Before establishing a PPP connection, ensure that GPRS is in the attached state. Add the query command AT+CGATT?:
If the return value is 1, you can directly proceed with the PPP connection; if the return value is 0, manual attachment is required, i.e., AT+CGATT=1.
Command Format
参数:
- `<state>`: Value range (0,1)
0: Indicates detach
1: Indicates attach
  - `0`: Indicates detach
  - `1`: Indicates attach

功能描述:
Turn on (or off) the module's AT command echo function.
The module's default echo function is in the on state.
This setting does not persist after power off.
Command Format
参数:
- `<value>`: Echo switch
0 Turn off echo (default)
1 Turn on echo
  - `0`: Turn off echo (default)
  - `1`: Turn on echo

功能描述:
Use an external protocol stack to perform GPRS dialing connection.
Before dialing, ensure that CREG has registered successfully and that the APN is set.
Command Format
Query extended signal strength.
参数:
- `<rxlev>`: Signal reception power

- `<ber>`: Bit error rate

- `<ecno>`: Downlink carrier interference ratio

- `<rsrq>`: Reference signal quality

- `<rsrp>`: Reference signal reception power

功能描述:
After dialing with the built-in protocol stack, query the DNS resolution result.
This command can only be executed after successfully dialing with AT+XIIC command.
The domain name is not validated for correctness; ensure the correctness of the input content.
Command format
参数:
- `<hostname>`: String, domain name, can be without double quotes, maximum length 128

- `<IP>`: String, IP address

- `<Sign>`: String, IP type, IPV4, IPV6

功能描述:
Set whether to allow the module to enter sleep mode. This command does not save settings after power off.
The module DTR signal is low by default:
After sending the command to allow entering sleep mode, and the module DTR signal is low (or high), all circuits of the module must be allowed to enter sleep state for the module to enter sleep.
Command format
参数:
- `<n>`: 0: Do not allow entering sleep mode (default)
1: Allow entering sleep mode (DTR signal low level enters sleep, high level exits sleep)
2: Allow entering sleep mode (DTR signal high level enters sleep, low level exits sleep)
  - `0`: Do not allow entering sleep mode (default)
  - `1`: Allow entering sleep mode (DTR signal low level enters sleep
  - `2`: Allow entering sleep mode (DTR signal high level enters sleep

- `<usb>`: 0: Do not allow USB remote sleep wakeup (default)
1: Enable USB remote sleep wakeup (the module can only enter sleep when the USB host suspends the USB bus; waking the module will occur when the USB host resumes the USB bus, and the module will wake the USB host on downlink network events (data, SMS, call))
  - `0`: Do not allow USB remote sleep wakeup (default)
  - `1`: Enable USB remote sleep wakeup (the module can only enter sleep when the USB host suspends the USB bus)

功能描述:
Module power off command. Before sending AT+NWPWROFF, the POWERKEY pin level of the module must be suspended or pulled high. After returning OK, if a reboot is needed, the POWERKEY pin level can be pulled low.
Command Format
参数:
- `<n>`: Power off option, in numeric form, with the following values:
0: Quick power off
1: Normal process power off
  - `Values are as follows`: 
  - `0`: Quick power off
  - `1`: Normal process power off

命令标题: Module Strong Transmit and Receive Command (For Testing Only)
功能描述:
Used to verify the module's strong transmit and receive capabilities in test mode, only testing the transmit power and receive power accuracy at the center frequency of each frequency band. Due to platform limitations, there are some errors in the accuracy of strong receive and transmit tests.
Strong transmit testing can only verify maximum transmit power of 23dB and 10dB, other values cannot be verified.
Command Format
参数:
- `<rftest_mode>`: 0: Exit strong transmit and receive test mode
1: Enter strong transmit and receive test mode
  - `0`: Exit strong transmit and receive test mode
  - `1`: Enter strong transmit and receive test mode

- `<rat>`: 1: LTE currently only supports testing with rat as LTE
  - `1`: LTE currently only supports testing with rat as LTE

- `<band>`: Frequency band indication
1: LTE band 1
2: LTE band 2
  - `1`: LTE band 1
  - `2`: LTE band 2

- `<bw>`: Bandwidth, platform limitation, currently only supports bw input as 0

- `<channel>`: Frequency point information (platform limitation, currently only supports the center frequency of each band, default value 0 indicates center frequency), center frequency information for each band is as follows:
LTE Band 1: Uplink frequency 18300   Downlink frequency 300
LTE Band 2: Uplink frequency 18900 Downlink frequency 900
LTE Band 3: Uplink frequency 19500 Downlink frequency 1575
LTE Band 4: Uplink frequency 20175 Downlink frequency 2175
LTE Band 5: Uplink frequency 20525 Downlink frequency 2525
LTE Band 6: Uplink frequency 20700 Downlink frequency 2700
LTE Band 7: Uplink frequency 21100 Downlink frequency 3100
LTE Band 8: Uplink frequency 12625 Downlink frequency 3625
LTE Band 20: Uplink frequency 24300 Downlink frequency 6300
LTE Band 28: Uplink frequency 27435 Downlink frequency 9435
LTE Band 34: Uplink frequency 36275 Downlink frequency 36275
LTE Band 38: Uplink frequency 38000 Downlink frequency 38000
LTE Band 39: Uplink frequency 38450 Downlink frequency 38450
LTE Band 40: Uplink frequency 39150 Downlink frequency 39150
LTE Band 41: Uplink frequency 40620 Downlink frequency 40620
LTE Band 66: Uplink frequency 59250 Downlink frequency 59350
  - `Default value 0`: indicates center frequency)
  - `Center frequency information for each band is as follows`: 
  - `LTE Band 1`: Uplink frequency 18300   Downlink frequency 300
  - `LTE Band 2`: Uplink frequency 18900 Downlink frequency 900
  - `LTE Band 3`: Uplink frequency 19500 Downlink frequency 1575
  - `LTE Band 4`: Uplink frequency 20175 Downlink frequency 2175
  - `LTE Band 5`: Uplink frequency 20525 Downlink frequency 2525
  - `LTE Band 6`: Uplink frequency 20700 Downlink frequency 2700
  - `LTE Band 7`: Uplink frequency 21100 Downlink frequency 3100
  - `LTE Band 8`: Uplink frequency 12625 Downlink frequency 3625
  - `LTE Band 20`: Uplink frequency 24300 Downlink frequency 6300
  - `LTE Band 28`: Uplink frequency 27435 Downlink frequency 9435
  - `LTE Band 34`: Uplink frequency 36275 Downlink frequency 36275
  - `LTE Band 38`: Uplink frequency 38000 Downlink frequency 38000
  - `LTE Band 39`: Uplink frequency 38450 Downlink frequency 38450
  - `LTE Band 40`: Uplink frequency 39150 Downlink frequency 39150
  - `LTE Band 41`: Uplink frequency 40620 Downlink frequency 40620
  - `LTE Band 66`: Uplink frequency 59250 Downlink frequency 59350

- `<chain_idx>`: Not applicable, directly fill in default value 0

- `<expected_rxagc>`: Expected receive power, as a negative value

- `<tx_enable>,`: Strong transmit test set to 1, strong receive test set to 0

- `<tx_power>`: Transmit power, platform limitation, currently only supports input of 23 and 10, representing maximum transmit power of 23dB and transmit power of 10dB respectively

- `<lte_start_rb>`: Not applicable, directly fill in default value 0

- `<lte_num_rb>`: Not applicable, directly fill in default value 0

- `<waveform>`: Not applicable, directly fill in default value 0

命令标题: Get Receive Power of the Module in Strong Receive Mode (For Testing Only)
功能描述:
Used to verify the module's receive power in test mode, strong receive test accuracy will have some errors.
Command Format
参数: - `<value>`: Receive power

示例命令:
AT+CSMS=1

+CSMS: 1,1,1
OK
AT+CSMS=2

ERROR
AT+CSMS?

+CSMS: 1,1,1,1
OK
AT+CSMS=?

+CSMS: (0,1)
OK
功能描述: Supported short messages include: sending (SMS-MO), receiving (SMS-MT), cell broadcast (SMS-CB).
备注: Supports multiple short message service types

功能描述:
For preferred SMS storage.
Command format
参数:
- `<mem1>
<mem2>
<mem3>
"SM"：
"ME"：
"MT"：`：Memory used for reading and deleting SMS, string type
Memory used for storing and sending SMS
If there is no route established to TE, the received SMS will be stored in this memory
SIM card SMS storage
ME SMS storage
SIM card and ME SMS storage
  - `Read and delete`: Memory used for SMS
  - `Store and send`: Memory used for SMS
  - `If there is no established`: route to TE
  - `then the received`: SMS will be stored in this memory
  - `SIM`: card and ME SMS storage
  - `ME`: SMS storage

- `<mem1>`: string type, e.g.: "SM", "ME"
"SM": SIM only
"ME": ME only
  - `For example`: "SM"
  - `"SM"`: SIM only
  - `"ME"`: ME only

- `<used>`: Number of used.

- `<total>`: Total capacity of the memory.

功能描述:
Set the input mode for SMS.
Command format
参数:
- `<mode>`: 0: PDU mode (default)
1: Text mode
  - `0`: PDU mode (default)
  - `1`: Text mode

功能描述:
Set the format of the TE character set.
Command Format
参数:
- `<chset>`: "GSM": GSM default alphabet (GSM03.38.6.2.1)
"IRA": International Reference Alphabet (ITU-T T.50)
"UCS2": 16-bit universal multiple-octet coded character set (USO/IEC10646). UCS2 strings are converted into a hexadecimal number (0x0000～0xFFFF), only the strings in the corresponding statement are encoded in UCS2, while the rest of the commands and responses remain in IRA alphabet format.
"PCCP936": Equivalent to GBK encoding format
"IRA": International Reference Alphabet (ITU-T T.50)
"UTF-8": A variable-length character encoding for Unicode
  - `"GSM"`: GSM default alphabet (GSM03.38.6.2.1)
  - `"IRA"`: International Reference Alphabet (ITU-T T.50)
  - `"UCS2"`: 16-bit universal multiple-octet coded character set (USO/IEC10646). UCS2 strings are converted into a hexadecimal number (0x0000～0xFFFF)
  - `"PCCP936"`: Equivalent to GBK encoding format
  - `"UTF-8"`: A variable-length character encoding for Unicode

功能描述:
Set how the module notifies the user after receiving a short message from the network.
Command Format
参数:
- `<mode>`: Set the indication method sent to the user after receiving an SMS.
0: SMS indication codes are cached in the module; if the TA is full, codes can be stored elsewhere or the oldest code can be discarded and replaced with the latest received code.
1: When in On-line State, discard the saved SMS indication codes and reject new indication codes; otherwise, directly display the codes on the terminal device.
2: When the module is in On-line State, SMS indication codes are cached in the module; after the connection is released, the SMS indication codes are output through the serial port; in other states, directly display the codes on the terminal device.
3: When the module is in On-line State, SMS indication codes are transmitted along with other data, and the codes are displayed on the terminal device.
  - `0`: SMS indication codes are cached in the module
  - `1`: When in On-line State
  - `2`: When the module is in On-line State
  - `3`: When the module is in On-line State

- `<mt>`: Set the format of the new SMS indication code, default value is 0
0: Do not send new SMS indication codes to the terminal.
1: New SMS indication code format is +CMTI: "MT",<index>, SMS content is stored but not directly displayed.
2: New SMS indication code format is +CMT: <oa>,<scts>,<tooa>,<lang>,<encod>,<priority>
[,<cbn>],<length><CR><LF><CR><LF><data> (text mode), SMS content is directly displayed but not stored.
3: Use the active reporting code defined by <mt>=2 to directly send the SMS indication code to the terminal device; other modes have the same indication code as <mt>=1.
  - `0`: Do not send new SMS indication codes to the terminal.
  - `1`: New SMS indication code format is +CMTI: "MT"
  - `2`: New SMS indication code format is +CMT: <oa>
  - `3`: Use the active reporting code defined by <mt>=2 to directly send the SMS indication code to the terminal device

- `<bm>`: Set the format of the new cell broadcast indication code, default value is 1.
0: Do not send new cell broadcast indication information; cell broadcast will not be stored.
2: New cell broadcast indication code format is +CBM: <oa>,[<alpha>,]<scts>[,<tooa>,<length>]
<CR><LF><data> (text mode), cell broadcast content is directly displayed but not stored.
  - `0`: Do not send new cell broadcast indication information
  - `2`: New cell broadcast indication code format is +CBM: <oa>

- `<ds>`: SMS sending status report, default value is 1.
0: No SMS sending status report
1: SMS sending status report code format is +CDS: <fo>,<mr>,[<ra>],[<tora>],<scts>,
<dt>,<st> (text mode)
  - `0`: No SMS sending status report
  - `1`: SMS sending status report code format is +CDS: <fo>

- `<bfr>`: Default value is 0.
0: When <mode> is set to 1 or 2, the codes defined by this command stored in the TA will be sent to the TE, and the module will return "OK" before sending the codes.
1: When <mode> is set to 1 or 2, the codes defined by this command stored in the TA will be cleared.
  - `Default value is`: 0.
  - `0`: When <mode> is set to 1 or 2
  - `1`: When <mode> is set to 1 or 2

功能描述:
Read the short message in the current storage (must be set in advance using the AT+CPMS command).
If the status of the received SMS is unread, executing this command will change the SMS storage status to read.
Command Format
参数:
- `<index>`: The index number of the SMS in <mem1>, CMGR reads the SMS from <mem1>

- `<stat>`: TEXT mode
“REC UNREAD” received unread message
“REC READ” received read message
“STO UNSENT” stored unsent message
“STO SENT” stored sent message
PDU mode
0 received unread message
1 received read message
2 stored unsent message
3 stored sent message
  - `TEXT`: mode
  - `“REC`: READ” received read message
  - `“STO`: SENT” stored sent message
  - `PDU`: mode
  - `0`: received unread message
  - `1`: received read message
  - `2`: stored unsent message
  - `3`: stored sent message

- `<alpha>`: Represented as a character-type number.

- `<length>`: The number of octets of the given TP layer data unit (excluding the octets of the service center address).

- `<pdu>`: PDU data.

功能描述:
Read a certain type of stored SMS, the messages will be read from the current storage selected by the +CPMS command.
Command Format
参数:
- `<stat>`: String type or numeric type
When AT+CMGF=1 is set:
"REC UNREAD": Received unread messages
"REC READ": Received read messages
"STO UNSENT": Stored unsent messages
"STO SENT": Stored sent messages
"ALL": All messages
When AT+CMGF=0 is set:
0: Received unread messages
1: Received read messages
2: Stored unsent messages
3: Stored sent messages
4: All messages
  - `When AT+CMGF=1 is set`: 
  - `"REC UNREAD"`: Received unread messages
  - `"REC READ"`: Received read messages
  - `"STO UNSENT"`: Stored unsent messages
  - `"STO SENT"`: Stored sent messages
  - `"ALL"`: All messages
  - `When AT+CMGF=0 is set`: 
  - `0`: Received unread messages
  - `1`: Received read messages
  - `2`: Stored unsent messages
  - `3`: Stored sent messages
  - `4`: All messages

功能描述:
Send a short message from the module to the network, after the short message is successfully sent, the network returns the reference value <mr> to the module.
Command Format
参数:
- `<da>`: Destination number for SMS in text mode

- `<text>`: SMS content in text mode

- `<length>`: Byte length of SMS content in PDU mode

- `<mr>`: Storage location

- `<CR>`: Termination character

- `<Ctrl+Z>`: Indicates the end of the message body input, i.e., the symbol "" in the example

- `<ESC>`: Indicates abandonment of message body input

- `<scts>`: Service center timestamp

- `<ackpdu>`: GPP 23.040 RP-User-Data element of RP-ACK PDU
  - `GPP`: 23.040 RP-User-Data element of RP-ACK PDU

功能描述:
Write a short message to the storage, after successful storage, return the location information <index>.
Command Format
参数:
- `<da>`: Destination number for SMS in text mode

- `<text>`: SMS content in text mode

- `<length>`: Byte length of SMS content in PDU mode

- `<index>`: Location information

- `<CR>`: Termination character

- `<Ctrl+Z>`: Indicates the end of the message body input, i.e., the symbol "" in the example

- `<ESC>`: Indicates abandonment of message body input

功能描述:
Send the short message (SMS-SUBMIT) located at the position specified by <index> in the memory. After the short message is successfully sent, the network returns the reference value <mr> to the terminal.
Command Format
参数:
- `<index>`: SMS sequence number in the memory

- `<da>`: Destination number for SMS in text mode

- `<toda>`: type of address
  - `type`: of address

- `<mr>`: storage location

- `<scts>`: service center timestamp

- `<ackpdu>`: 3GPP 23.040 RP-User-Data element of RP-ACK PDU
  - `3GPP`: 23.040 RP-User-Data element of RP-ACK PDU

功能描述:
Delete short messages from the current memory.
Command Format
参数:
- `<index>`: Record number of the stored short message

- `<delflag>`: Integer value
0: Delete the short message with the specified record number
1: Delete all read short messages
2: Delete all read and sent short messages
3: Delete all read, sent, and unsent short messages
4: Delete all short messages
  - `0`: Delete the short message with the specified record number
  - `1`: Delete all read short messages
  - `2`: Delete all read and sent short messages
  - `3`: Delete all read, sent, and unsent short messages
  - `4`: Delete all short messages

功能描述:
Set the SMS center number. This command is not supported in CDMA mode.
Command Format
参数:
- `<sca>`: SMS center number, string type.

- `<tosca>`: SMS center number format. 129 indicates a normal number type, 145 indicates an international number type.

功能描述:
In text mode, select the required values for additional parameters, set the validity period starting from when the message is received from the SMSC, or define the absolute time that terminates the validity period.
Command Format
参数:
- `<fo>`: <fo>: Depends on the command or result code: the first 8 bits of GSM 03.40 SMS-DELIVER;
SMS-SUBMIT (default value: 17); or use an integer type SMS-COMMAND (default value: 2)
  - `<fo>`: Depends on the command or result code: the first 8 bits of GSM 03.40 SMS-DELIVER
  - `SMS-SUBMIT (default value`: 17)
  - `or use an integer type SMS-COMMAND (default value`: 2)

- `<vp>`: —
  - `0-143`: (vp+1)*5mins, maximum 12 hours
  - `144-167`: 12 hours +((vp–143)*30mins), maximum 24 hours
  - `168-196`: (vp–166)*1day
  - `197-255`: (vp–192)*1week

- `<pid>`: Integer type TP-Protocol-Identifier (default value: 0)
  - `Integer type TP-Protocol-Identifier (default value`: 0)

- `<dcs>`: Integer type Cell Broadcast Data Coding Scheme (default value: 0)
  - `Integer type Cell Broadcast Data Coding Scheme (default value`: 0)

功能描述:
Set whether to display detailed header information in the result code in text mode. This command is valid in SMS text mode and requires sending AT+CMGF=1 to set to text mode.
Command Format
参数:
- `<show>`: 0: Do not display (default value)
1: Display
  - `0`: Do not display (default value)
  - `1`: Display
